episodeTitle: I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!

events.title: Luffy's First Appearance
events.description: Monkey D. Luffy emerges from a barrel, introducing himself to Koby and declaring his dream to become King of the Pirates.
events.significance: Establishes the protagonist and the series' central goal.

quotes.text: I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy's first declaration of his dream

events.title: Gomu Gomu no Pistol Debut
events.description: Luffy uses his signature stretching punch for the first time, demonstrating his Devil Fruit powers.
events.significance: First display of Luffy's fighting abilities and Devil Fruit powers.

quotes.text: I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!
quotes.speaker: Luffy

themes.description: The episode establishes Luffy's unwavering dream to become Pirate King despite the dangers.
themes.symbolism: The barrel represents Luffy emerging into the world, ready to chase his dream.

characterSpotlights.development: We meet Luffy and learn about his dream, his Devil Fruit powers, and his carefree personality.
keyActions: Declares his dream to become Pirate King
quotes: I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime added a scene of Luffy in the barrel during the storm that wasn't in the manga.

trivia.fact: This episode aired on October 20, 1999, the same day as the manga's chapter 100 release.
Mayumi Tanaka, Luffy's voice actress, was 44 years old when she first voiced him.
